history.proof: intros v s. destruct s as [n | f ts]. - simpl. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v n) as [Heq | Hneq]. -- subst. hauto lq: on depth: 3. -- hauto lq: on depth: 3. - simpl. hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet --: Current bullet -- is not finished.
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet -- is not finished.

Abstracting over the terms "n" and "ts" leads to a term fun (n0 : nat) (ts0 : fol.Terms L n0) => (if Nat.eq_dec v v then fol.apply L f ts0 else var v) = fol.apply L f ts0 which is ill-typed. Reason is: Illegal application: The term "fol.apply" of type "forall (L : Language) (f : Functions L), fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f)) -> fol.Term L" cannot be applied to the terms "L" : "Language" "f" : "Functions L" "ts0" : "fol.Terms L n0" The 3rd term has type "fol.Terms L n0" which should be coercible to "fol.Terms L (arity L (inr f))".

original: intros v s. destruct s as [n | f ts]. - simpl. destruct (Nat.eq_dec v n) as [Heq | Hneq]. -- subst. auto. -- simpl. auto. - simpl. induction ts. -- auto. -- simpl. f_equal. apply IHts.
